text: (naashukree ka ek qissa suno) moosa kee qaum se ek shakhs kaarun (naamee) tha to usane un par sarakashee shuru kee aur hamane usako is qadar khazaane ata kie the ki unakee kunjiyaan ek sakatadaar jamaat (kee jaamat) ko uthaana doobhar ho jaata tha jab (ek baar) usakee qaum ne usase kaha ki (apanee daulat par) itara mat kyonki khuda itaraane vaalon ko dost nahin rakhata
